turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: Why did you let it get into a populated area?

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: It's made itself look like the woman's dead husband.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: The extraterrestrial now looks like this.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: You sure you want this, because... that's putting an awful lot of faith in people we have no control over...

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: I'm afraid the situation demands that kind of risk.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: Dammit Shermin. Earlier you were asking for help. What's changed?

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: It's messy... the thing's got a gun... We're just asking for somebody to get killed...

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: We don't know what else to do. We need results.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: You'll get results one way or the other, that's for sure... Okay.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: I'm gonna be here if you need anything.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: We're growing very concerned back here. There's no use pretending otherwise. We're rapidly approaching a 'condition red.' People are beginning to ask difficult questions.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: I'll make this as simple as I can, George. They disappeared.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: I don't care where you're from you just can't disappear into thin air.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: George, listen to what you're saying. This thing's changed itself into a man. Disappearing may not be that big a deal.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: So far you've let it cross the heart of America. For two days it has been absorbing information that is detrimental to our security. I don't see the humor in that.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Maybe... look, this is just something to think about... from what I got at the shopping center, it was more scared than anything else... I don't feel it's as big a threat as you think it is...

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: Is that what's affecting your performance?

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: I'm not being unpatriotic, and I'm doing my damndest to catch them. Bell's up on 80 and I'm down here on 70 past Grand Junction. They're heading west. If they're not flying we have a damn good chance of getting them. All I'm asking is that you people think about it.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: You just do your job, Shermin. We'll make the policy.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: We have a new directive. I'm taking over.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: We don't have to do it that way. We can catch him this time.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: Washington thinks it's too late for that.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: I've never been taken off an assignment in my life. Give me twenty- four hours and I'll have him for you.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: You can change a directive, George. You've done it before. Listen to me. He's going somewhere in Death Valley. Lathrop Wells was never anything but a bus stop. East is the nuclear site. There are no roads in there. She was teaching him to hitchhike. I'm telling you. We block the four roads into Death Valley and we got him.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: We'll do that. But how are we going to hold him? He can change himself into a man. He can disappear.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: That's the chance we have to take.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Then you're going to have to do it without me.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: You're a career intelligence officer, Shermin. You'll be in the air with us.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: You're talking about taking a life. The most unique life form on this planet. I think we're better than that.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: I'm afraid we can't let you go.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: George... Do you hear me, George?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I want to speak to Marc Shermin.

turns.speaker: FOX
turns.text: You can speak to me, Mrs. Haydn. I'm in charge of this operation now.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: If I don't speak to Mr. Shermin, I'm hanging up.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I won't let anyone hurt you.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: This is Marc Shermin. Where are you, Mrs. Haydn?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I don't know. Someplace called Elmo's. Look, I just wanted to tell you that I'm all right and I'm on my way home.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: You've been through quite an ordeal, Mrs. Haydn. Why don't you stay where you are and let us pick you up? We'll fly you home.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No. You'll want to ask a lot of questions I don't want to answer right now. I already have a ride.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Is the man who kidnapped you there now?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I told you. He let me go. I'm on my way home.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Get a highway patrol unit over there.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Mr... I'm sorry, what was your name again?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Mr. Shermin, I'm hanging up now. If you want to ask me any questions, call me at home in a couple of days. I'm in the book.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Do you know what you were kidnapped by?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: He doesn't want to hurt anybody. Please leave him alone.

turns.speaker: SHERMIN
turns.text: Is he on his way to Lathrop Wells?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Why are you doing this to me? I'll give you whatever...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Which way do you want to go?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: We're going to have to stop for gas soon.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You're full of tricks, aren't you?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No gas... car dead.  We need gas. I don't want to get shot for running out of gas.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: It's closed... closed. We need one that's open.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Not what. Who. What is for things.  What? What? What? What? For people you use who. Who is he?  Who is she?  Who are you?  Who am I?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: Who is he? Who is she? Who are you? Who am I?  Who are you?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: That's a big help. Where are you from?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Are you from up there? Space?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Up there... I... eh... can't explain...  But that's the only place you could be from.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No. I don't know what you are, but you're not Scott.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No, no... don't say that. Bad word.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Stop!! Enough!! Jesus! You're worse than a parrot!!

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Attendant. He'll give us gas. Put the gun down. Under the seat. Under the seat...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Oh God! You're going to get us both killed. Okay... in your pocket...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: This stuff could kill...  Be my guest.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: That was a red light!! I told you you have to stop at a red light!!

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I will see it next time.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Why are you going here? What is here?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: My...  ...car will take me...  ...up there... home.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: When do you have to be here?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: How will I do this one?...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Sun... day. No sun... night. You understand?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: How many days and nights do you have to go...  ...here?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: That's not much time. I'll just slow you down. I have to sleep. I'm very tired. And I have to wash and eat. You don't...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I won't tell anybody if that's what you're worried about. I promise. You'll keep...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You'll keep the car. I'll take a bus...  Am I going up there with you... in your ship... up there?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Then let me go. You don't need me.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I feel like I'm going crazy here. You're Scott. But he's dead. I don't know what's real anymore. I can't be here with you.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Do you understand what I'm saying to you? You can keep the car.  That should be enough for gas from here to there. Please let me go.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: The closest I was able to get you was Lathrop Wells...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: A baby is a new person?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I'd love to have a baby. But I can't...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I can't... Forget the baby. Okay? The closest I was able to get you was Lathrop Wells. You'll have to hitchhike the rest of the way.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I know that. But the buses don't go there.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: That's easy. I'll explain that in a minute. This is your ticket. When you get on the bus here, the driver will take this part. You will ride to Omaha. When you get to Omaha, ask the driver. 'Salt Lake City, please. I do not speak English.'

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: 'Salt Lake City, please. I do not speak English.'

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Will you please do it my way? You'll get into trouble if you don't. If anybody talks to you, tell them... I do not speak English.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Right. In Omaha the driver will put you on the bus for Salt Lake City and the new driver will take...  ...this part. When you get to Salt Lake City, ask the driver, 'Las Vegas, please'...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: 'Las Vegas, please. I do not speak English.' What is hitchhike?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: 'Lathrop Wells, please. I do not speak English.'

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You keep this. Now this is hitch- hike...  You stand on the side of the road, the highway... you understand? And you face the cars going in the direction you want to go. When you see a car or a truck coming, you stick out your thumb like this...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Your thumb tells the driver that you want a ride.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Not every car, but... a car will stop... Maybe not the first car... maybe number eight, number fifteen...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: When do I get to Lathrop Wells?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Tomorrow morning. Start hitch-hiking right away and...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Don't worry. They're not going to hurt you. Come on.  Only show this to the driver. Nobody else. And don't lose it.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Don't be afraid. Do what I told you and you'll be okay.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Well... I'm going to go now.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Yes. I have a long ride ahead of me...  Goodbye.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Why did your ship land on this planet... on Earth?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You thought we were a different planet?!

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: No. My ship was doing a map of all the suns and...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Stars... When a sun is far away, we call it a 'star.'

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: We were doing a map of the stars and all the other things up there when we saw a small ship. My... eh... we kidnapped it. On it there was a map that said how to come to Earth. This was very important. Before then, we thought we were the only people in all the stars.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You did? That's funny. So did we.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: We told our home, and the people who tell us what to do on my planet said to come and look but not to talk, not to land, not to shoot. Just to look from up there. We came and... the driver of my ship...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: The captain wanted to land to see close and to get some things from Earth to take home. The police came and shot at us. One of the people from my ship was killed.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Oh, that's terrible. I'm sorry. Was he a good friend?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: A friend is a person that is good to you... someone you like to be with... someone you like to laugh with...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: He was a good friend... The captain took the ship away fast and I was not in the ship.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: The police shouldn't have started shooting. But you can hardly blame them. You surprised them. They didn't know you were up there. When they saw you, they thought you were here to hurt us.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Sounds like your captain's going to get hell when he gets back home.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I've noticed... Do you understand what they're saying?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: Not all... but it feels like a kiss.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Do you have music up there?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I'd like to hear it. Can you sing something?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Don't be afraid... I'd really like to hear it.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I am not a good singer.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: But I have never seen this before. I am not complete.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You shouldn't drink so much of that stuff. It's bad for you.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: On the radio they say it's good.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: The machine gave me two. Should I put one back?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I'm not sleepy anymore. Let's drive for a little while longer.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No. I'm just not tired. Let's go.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I told you goodbye. Why are you here?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: The police are waiting for you up ahead. There's a roadblock. You have to go back.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: This car will take me to Las Vegas. I cannot go back.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: The police know about Lathrop Wells. We have to go another way. Come on.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: If I don't meet the ship, my people will go home without me.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Please understand. If you go this way, you'll never get to your ship. The police know about Lathrop Wells. We have to go another way. I'll get you to your ship. I promise.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I will go. But not you.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You shit! I'll decide if I go or not. Not you. I don't know what you do on your planet, but I didn't think that was very nice walking out on me like you did.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I don't want you to be hurt.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Why can't we wait here for a ride?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I feel better if I move.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: We're hundreds of miles from where you have to be.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: We're not going to get a ride tonight.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I can't stay on this planet.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No one's traveling in this weather.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: You promised you would get me to my ship.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I will. I will. We still have another day.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: What do you want from me? There are no cars on this road. I didn't ask for this stupid storm.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: You can stop. I will go on alone.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: We're too far away to walk. Don't you understand?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Why don't you send one of your radio balloons and tell your captain that you might be late?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I used the last one to jump off the cliff...

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Let's find a place out of the rain. I'm sure we'll get a ride in the morning.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I can't be late. I don't know if the radio balloons work above your planet. I don't know if my words went to the ship. If I'm not there, the captain will think I'm dead and go.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: We'll get a ride in the morning.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You don't forget anything, do you?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Hello... hello. How are you this morning?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: No, they don't talk... We talk to them.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I gave you a baby last night.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: You have been very good to me, Jennyhaydn.  You said you wanted a baby, so I gave you one.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: It will be human and it will look like this.  But when it comes it will know everything I know and everything you know. That is something from my planet that I want your baby to have.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I told you it's impossible for me to have a baby.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: You will have this baby. If you want it. If you don't, I can stop it now.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: The cowboys were right. You can make money fast gambling.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You don't make money gambling. You lose it.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: May I have twenty-five cents, please?

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Here are two quarters. When you lose these, you're not going to get anymore.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: This is crazy. We don't have time for this.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I know how to gamble now.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: You won ten dollars. Big deal. If we don't get a good ride before dark we could miss your ship.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I want to get money for you and the baby.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: I don't need any money for the baby. I'll be fine.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: Inflation, tuition, college. Children are damned expensive. I know.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: If I ever run into that guy, I'm going to kick his ass.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: It'll tell you pretty much everything about us...

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: This is very interesting. We are born knowing our history. We have other books. But not a book like this.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: Any words you don't know you can find in the dictionary.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: It'll give you the different countries, how they came to be, what they are now, how America came to be, the governments, the languages... everything.

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: Many of my people will not believe those things are possible. On my planet there is only one government, one people, one language. I will be asked a lot of questions.

turns.speaker: JENNY
turns.text: What will you say about us?

turns.speaker: STAR MAN
turns.text: I will say that we can be friends.
